com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise
Class SmartServoLINDataSource

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      com.kuka.roboticsAPI.motionModel.CommandDataSource
          com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.ServoDataSource
              com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.SmartServoLINDataSource
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.kuka.roboticsAPI.motionModel.IServoRuntime, ISmartServoLINRuntime, java.util.Observer
public class SmartServoLINDataSource
extends com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.ServoDataSource
implements ISmartServoLINRuntime

The data source of linear smart servo motions.

This element is an undocumented internal feature. It is not intended to be used by applications as it might change or be removed in future versions.

setDestination

public long setDestination(com.kuka.roboticsAPI.geometricModel.AbstractFrame currCartesianDestination,
                           double[] targetVel)
Description copied from interface: ISmartServoLINRuntime
Set the new destination.

Note: The orientation change is realized by interpolating Euler angles. To avoid problems with gimbal lock the maximum change of the Euler angle B is limited to +/- 60 degrees. This limit is calculated starting from the initial pose of the SmartServoLIN motion.

Specified by:
setDestination in interface ISmartServoLINRuntime
Parameters:
currCartesianDestination - The new cartesian position [mm].
targetVel - The target velocity for x,y,z in the cartesian space [mm/s].
Returns:
The time stamp in milliseconds

Description copied from interface: ISmartServoLINRuntime
Set the new destination.

Note: The orientation change is realized by interpolating Euler angles. To avoid problems with gimbal lock the maximum change of the Euler angle B is limited to +/- 60 degrees. This limit is calculated starting from the initial pose of the SmartServoLIN motion.

Specified by:

setMaxTranslationVelocity

public void setMaxTranslationVelocity(double[] value)
Description copied from interface: ISmartServoLINRuntime
Sets the maximum translational velocity value for this servo motion [mm/sec].

The specified value is a maximal value for the servo motion.

Specified by:
setMaxTranslationVelocity in interface ISmartServoLINRuntime
Parameters:
value - the absolute translational velocity value for this servo motion [mm/sec]. This value must be greater than 0.
